txt.en: Achassoth can be found in the central Fields of Fornost, north of the road leading west towards Evendim.\n\nYou should defeat Achassoth, for this being has sapped the warmth from the Fields of Fornost.

Achassoth can be found in the central Fields of Fornost, north of the road leading west towards Evendim.\n\nYou should defeat Achassoth, for this being has sapped the warmth from the Fields of Fornost.
You have defeated one of the chief forces of evil in the Fields of Fornost, bloodthirsty Achassoth, killer of Men.
You have defeated one of the chief forces of evil in the Fields of Fornost.
You have encounted Achassoth, a terrifying presence in the Fields of Fornost....

You feel a hatred bent upon you, and realize that a presence filled with fury is near.\n\nYou have encounted Achassoth, a terrifying being in the Fields of Fornost. This ghostly entity has grown in bloodlust from having pulled the life from the lands around it.
